Server

Interface ServerInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote

    public interface ServerInterface
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Interfaccia del Server Remoto, contiene tutti i metodi associati al Server
    Author:
    Lorenzo Gavazzeni
